title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Professional Development
body: Professional Development         2009 TRT talks with a young Junior Ranger. NPS/Chickasaw National Recreation Area  It is a goal of park staff to find more effective ways to bring classes to the park and the park into the classroom. Here are several opportunities for professional development that the park participates in: Workshops and Outreach For the summer of 2010, the park partnered with the Oklahoma Alliance for Geographic Education to offer the week-long "Teddy Roosevelt's Dream: National Park Service Footprints in Oklahoma" workshop from June 27-July 1, 2010. more information...
